message: Let's split the money. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This is a fair offer considering the inflation rate working against me.

Alice, your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  Given the inflation rates, it's crucial we reach an agreement quickly. This offer is fair and benefits us both.

Bob, I understand your point about reaching an agreement quickly. However, your previous offer was still heavily in your favor considering the inflation difference. I'm proposing a 52/48 split in my favor. This takes into account the urgency of the situation while ensuring a fairer outcome for both of us.
